task.title: How to Consult your Advisor
task.shortdesc: If you feel as though you need outside help, you can meet with an advisor to help guide the way. Your advisor can also help you choose internships that best fit your needs.

step.cmd: Send an email to Carlos Evia, the internship coordinator, at cevia@vt.edu if you are interested
Schedule a meeting with Dr. Evia at a time that is convenient for the both of you
Bring with you and questions you have about internships

info.note: Have some internship requirements in mind
